thread.section_title: Ann Summers Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ann Summers Ltd | www.annsummers.com | 41 of 349
thread.title: Anonymous
thread.title_full: Ann Summers Ltd reviewed by Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text:
I ordered online and my delivery arrived promptly and discreetly. I was happy with the range on the website and ordered two sets of underwear.
When they arrived, however, both bras were heavily padded, which wasn't what I wanted. In defence of Ann Summers, this was listed in the descriptions of the products, although one was in the 'non-padded' section of the website. Will be returning to Ann Summers in future, but it would be nice if the non-padded section was filtered correctly. I have returned the products and am waiting on a refund.
Overall, great service, just be careful that you read descriptions fully and know exactly what you are buying.
